msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

author.persName: Dashtakī, ʻAṭāʼ Allāh ibn Faḍl Allāh, -1400 or 1401>

msItem.title: Rawḍat al-aḥbāb fī siyar al-Nabī wa-al-āl wa-al-aṣḥāb
روضة الاحباب في سير النبي والآل والاصحاب
msItem.note: Part of Maqsad 1. Bound with Codrington/Reade No 51, which it precedes. Front flyleaf, recto: In pencil, title and catalogue numbers. Slip cut from Morley's printed catalogue pasted in, with description of No XXXVIII (Codrington/Reade No 51). Folio 1, recto: In ink: David Price; In Arabic script titles and notes of purchase. One recording purchase by Husain 'Ali, another purchase at Akbarabad. Labels on spine: leather: R.A.S, P. CAT. 38. Paper: Habib-es-Siyar Vol. 2.a.; now detached: Persian 49; 19. The same work as No 18, but incomplete, breaking off in the events of A.H. 5 (A.D. 626?). [Not year 4] Iluminated first page. Ruled margins on first 64 folios. Rubricated headings, Arabic quotations etc.

listBibl.bibl: For Price's bequest see the Journal for 1836, pp. xii-xiv (an obituary note p. lx).

bindingDesc.p: Red leather oriental binding with flap and blind-tooled panels. In poor condition. Front and back boards detached.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
